title: All I Have To Give
lyrics: Intro: -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- I dont know what he does to make you cry, but I'll be there to make you smil e I dont have fan cy   cars to get to you, I walk a thousand mi les I dont care if he buy's you nice thing's, d oes his gift's come from th e heart ? I dont know b ut   i f you were my girl, I 'll make it su re we'll neve r be apart But my l ove is al l I h ave to give , without you I do nt think I ca n live I wish I could giv e the  world to you, but love is al l I have to give (Hey girl) Hey girl, I don't want to hide no more inside All the money in the world can never add up to all the love I have inside I love you......................................( - - - ) My love is all!!! ( i have to give )
